short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows to resolve decoded url's in adress bar

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: How many times you've tried to open a link, but unfortunately it was decoded, or actual link was decoded inside? Now it is not a problem anymore. With only one click you can proceed to actual url, you wanted to visit.
